Attribute.name: id_person
Attribute.doc: The person who gave the response

Attribute.name: guid_object
Attribute.doc: The guid object of the process that started this response. Used when the person is not registered in the system

Attribute.name: start
Attribute.doc: The timestamp when the user started filling the form

Attribute.name: end
Attribute.doc: The timestamp when the user ended filling the form

Attribute.name: current_page
Attribute.doc: The page where the person is filling the form

Attribute.name: response_data
Attribute.doc: An xml object containing all the response data
